lostpwd_recovery.mail_notfound: No user with this email address registered.
lostpwd_recovery.subject: FH Kufstein - New password
lostpwd_recovery.head: Password recovery
lostpwd_recovery.body_intro: As you might have lost/forgotten your password, we have sent you a new pwd here. Please login with your new password.
lostpwd_recovery.body_conclusion: If you know your password and didn't do this, please contact the administrator immediately.

wizard.descr: This is a basic wizard for adding new models.

step1.descr: This step focuses on searching for available models. After selecting a model you can add new variations of it.

step2.descr: Drag (multiple) files or upload them manually by clicking onto the dropzone.
